amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for International Military Education and Training by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 29 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996 to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Intern ational Education and Training by $3 million, from $45 million to $42 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 231 (Roll no. 215).
